definition.text: Write a summary for this review page.

paragraphs.text: Love for the first sight? Not necessarly :)

I've read some reviews about Superalgos before I opened it, and knew, that it has a step learning curve so I haven't expected that will be easy and straightforward and gues what... it is NOT at all, absolutely :D
It is hard to get the idea at the beginning but from my perspective, the way how you navigate through the Design Space doesn't make this task easier. Fortunately I forgot about it after some time.

What I don't still get used to is this "pop up" menu, displayed after the hover any element. It is really annoying when there are few elements close to each other and when I want to display menu of the specific one, I have to conduct mousre pointer over the free places, around other elements just to get the interesting one. And when by accident I display menu of other element, I have to move mouse outside this big circle to make it disappear and try again. I hope that I just do not know everything about navigating or maybe I also need more time.

I cannot say much more right know about usability because I'm still at the beginning of this adventure but what I know for sure that it has tons of features and I know that I will find here what I'm looking for:)
